tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_communications (
    communication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    communication_channel VARCHAR(50),
    communication_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    communication_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    date_created TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE communications (
    communication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    channel VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    communication_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    datetime_sent TIMESTAMP,
    content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE emails (
    email_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    subject VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    body TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE phone_calls (
    call_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    duration INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE email_communications (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  email_address TEXT,
  subject TEXT,
  body TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE phone_communications (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  phone_number TEXT,
  call_duration INT,
  call_type TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE chat_communications (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  chat_id TEXT,
  message TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE customer_interactions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  interaction_type TEXT,
  interaction_description TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  phone_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE emails (
  email_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  email_subject VARCHAR(100),
  email_body TEXT,
  email_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
